```{r}
table <- dt_metrics[, .(Id, RHR_mean, RHR_sd, )]

table <- data.frame(
  RHR = c(mean(dt_metrics$RHR_median), mean(dt_metrics$RHR_sd), mean(dt_metrics$RHR_size)),
  notRHR = c(mean(dt_metrics$notRHR_median), mean(dt_metrics$notRHR_sd), mean(dt_metrics$notRHR_size)),
  clinicRHR = c(mean(dt_hr_clinical_closest$mean_RHR), NA, NA)
)

colnames(table) <- c("Est. RHR", "Est. non-RHR", "Clinic RHR")
rownames(table) <- c("Mean Value (bpm)", "Mean SD (bpm)", "Mean Size")

kable(table, "latex") %>%
  kable_styling(position = "center")
```
